mapper.select: SELECT Extent1.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID SALES_ORD_ID , --Extent1.OTSTND OTSTND , Extent1.SALES_DT SALES_DT , Extent1.SALES_PRC SALES_PRC , --Extent1.BILL_MONTH BILL_MONTH , Extent1.PNALTY PNALTY , Extent1.CUST_NAME CUST_NAME , Extent1.CONTACTNAME CNTC_NAME , Extent1.ADD1 ADD1 , Extent1.ADD2 ADD2 , Extent1.ADD3 ADD3 , Extent1.SAREA SAREA , Extent1.SPOST_CODE SPOST_CODE , Extent1.SSTATE SSTATE , Extent1.SCOUNTRY SCOUNTRY , Extent1.STK_CODE STK_CODE , Extent1.STK_DESC STK_DESC , Extent1.INSTALL_ADDR1 INSTALL_ADDR1 , Extent1.INSTALL_ADDR2 INSTALL_ADDR2 , Extent1.INSTALL_ADDR3 INSTALL_ADDR3 , Extent1.INSTALL_AREA INSTALL_AREA , Extent1.INSTALL_POST_CODE INSTALL_POST_CODE , Extent1.INSTALL_STATE INSTALL_STATE , Extent1.INSTALL_CNTY INSTALL_CNTY , Extent1.SERIAL_NO SERIAL_NO , Extent1.INSTALL_DT INSTALL_DT FROM SAL1018V Extent1 WHERE Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID = #{value}
